I found your Adidas T-shirt order and retrieved its invoice, but the system only confirms that the invoice was emailed to your linked inbox; it doesn’t expose the actual attachment or file contents to me. I also checked your local directories (/user and /downloads), and there is no invoice file there that I can copy or move.

Because I cannot see or download the invoice file itself from your email, I’m unable to save the actual invoice document to `/user`.

What you can do to complete this:

1. Open the email inbox linked to your shopping account.
2. Locate the invoice email for order `ORDER-104674` (Adidas Mens Z.n.e. T-Shirt, ordered 2024-04-18).
3. Download the attached invoice file (likely PDF).
4. Save or move that downloaded file into the `/user` directory (or your equivalent local “user” folder).

If you’d like, I can help you draft the exact wording to search for in your email or rename the file (e.g., `invoice_ORDER-104674.pdf`) once you have it.
